document_data.name: Akdam's Traveling Spellbook
document_data.author: [[Akdam]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Akdam's Traveling Spellbook''''' was a [[spellbook]] written by [[Akdam]]. It was a thin, traveling spellbook containing several simple spells. The title was printed on the cover in an old, rare script.{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|78}}

The [[Vipers]] bandits took it from a [[merchant]] and their leader, [[Cedric Ravajar]], kept it at the [[Vipers' Nest]] in [[1369 DR]]. The spellbook contained the following [[spell]]s: ''[[alarm]]'', ''[[dancing lights]]'', ''[[detect magic]]'', ''[[light]]'', ''[[mount]]'', ''[[deeppockets]]'', and ''[[fog cloud]]''.
